title: Special needs cheer fundraiser
content: A fundraiser for the special needs cheer team “Dazzle” of Chino will be 11 a.m. to 10 p.m. Thursday, June 7 at California Pizza Kitchen, 3505 Grand Ave., Chino Hills.    Proceeds from the event will help the team with expenses for its performance at the 2018 Special Olympics Seattle USA Games, July 1 to 7; and the Special Olympics 50th Anniversary and Individual Team Competitions in Chicago, July 17 to 21.
